It’s Okay To Not Be Okay. God Meets You Where You Are

A church living on mission, influencing our community in Richardson TX & beyond with the love of Jesus. We meet Sunday mornings at 10:30am.

Our Beliefs:

  • In the Essential beliefs we have unity.
  • In the Non-essential beliefs we have liberty.
  • In all our beliefs we maintain an attitude of love.

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I become a Christian?

Bowel related problems have become an integral part of the lives of the average Americans, thanks to the abundance of fast foods in their diet. Low vitality, stomach bloat, poor digestion– are all the natural corollaries of irregular.
